Tips for Kfc Contributor Joined 9 years ago August 21, 2008 For more than 60 years, this all-American institution has been serving its signature chicken and home-style sides.. In Short Established in 1939, this fast-food restaurant still makes its legendary fried chicken with the closely guarded blend of 11 herbs and spices originally created by founder Colonel Sanders. Modern additions to the menu include oven-roasted renditions of its chicken sandwiches, popcorn chicken, potato wedges and wraps. Classic sides include flaky, oversized biscuits, steaming-hot mashed potatoes and gravy, smoky-sweet baked beans and crisp, generously dressed coleslaw. Kids and adults love the "little bucket" parfaits of pudding desserts. … View More View Less 0 Heart Doesn't Recommend animegirlyasha Joined 5 years ago 2.0 September 09, 2007 never gets it right... every time i come to this place they get my order wrong.If you ask for something like barbcue sauce they rarely give it to you and you will wait in the drive thru for ever..and alot of times you will get a biscut brick...that is soo hard you could knock someone out with it..and if that doesn't happen they are out of extra crispy chicken. … View More View Less 0 Heart
